summary: Add 2 Tattoos (for now), inspired by the Nordic, Tattoo, Art, Mythology.
descriptionHtml:
Hi,
 
This is my first mod, it's a nordic tattoo mod to use with Slavetats and Racemenu.

For a male version, I don't know why the mod don't work (on my game, I don't know if it work with another bodytype or something else) But if someone can help me to understand that, I'm ok.

 
So, it's inspired by some nordic tattoo, nordic art and nordic mythology.

If you have some trouble
 
[b]For the future :[/b]
 
- Rework the inner thigh to fix the texture seam 
- Add more tattoo, face, feet, hand, body.
- Maybe inspired by some the witcher's tattoo.
 
[b]Requires:[/b]
[center][b]For SlaveTats Version[/b][/center]
- Slavetats : http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/619-slavetats/ (NFSW :) )
- (Requirements for Slavetats => JContainers, Racemenu (orNioverride), SkyUi, SKSE)

[center][/center][b][center]For Racemenu Version[/center][/b]- Racemenu : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
- (Requirements for Racemenu => SKSE)


[b]Credit :[/b]
 
- Lupas-Deva for celtic wolf pattern : [url=http://lupas-deva.deviantart.com/art/Vector-Celtic-Wolf-308829338]http://lupas-deva.de...-Wolf-308829338[/url]
- Murfk for Slavetats and the tuto for make your own tattoo pack : [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/619-slavetats/]http://www.loverslab.../619-slavetats/
[/url]- Expired for Racemenu : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
- Vwr for vwr Racemenu Mod Maker : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49349/?
- CPU for his tuto to solve the compile problem : http://www.loverslab.com/topic/45100-how-to-solve-compile-problems-after-latest-ck-update-from-steam/
- Vikings for their arts, creation.
- Bethesda for The Elder Scroll V : Skyrim
 
(If my english is bad you can correct the sentence)
author: Kysuak
